thread.title: BRIEF-Aon, HP Announce Strategic Collaboration For IT Security And Cyber Risk Management Services

title: BRIEF-Aon, HP Announce Strategic Collaboration For IT Security And Cyber Risk Management Services

organizations.name: it security and cyber risk management services reuters

text:
April 10, 2018 / 12:12 PM / Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-Aon, HP Announce Strategic Collaboration For IT Security And Cyber Risk Management Services Reuters Staff 
April 10 (Reuters) - Aon Plc: 
* CO, HP ANNOUNCE STRATEGIC COLLABORATION FOR COMPREHENSIVE IT SECURITY AND CYBER RISK MANAGEMENT SERVICES 
* LEVEL SECURITY PROTECTION, COMPREHENSIVE RISK ASSESSMENT AND REMEDIATION, RAPID INCIDENT RESPONSE 
* SOLUTION WILL BE AVAILABLE THROUGH HP DEVICE AS A SERVICE OFFERING * HP JOINT OFFERING IS EXPECTED TO LAUNCH IN FALL 2018 
* INITIALLY, OFFERING WILL BE AVAILABLE DIRECTLY FROM HP AND THROUGH CHANNEL PARTNERS IN U.S. ONLY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
